nodes.text: Star Wars Art is a series of Star Wars art books published by Abrams Books. The series includes Star Wars Art: Visions, Star Wars Art: Comics, Star Wars Art: Illustration, Star Wars Art: Concept, Star Wars Art: Posters, Star Wars Art: A Poster Collection, and Star Wars Art: Ralph McQuarrie. Each book was compiled with the direct input of Star Wars creator George Lucas as image curator.
